Our Suppliers

Partnering to deliver quality goods and services for a better future.

Delivering More for Communities with Our Suppliers

At GOALPrime Organization Nigeria (GPON), we recognize that our suppliers play a critical role in our mission by delivering the right quality goods and services to the place of need at the required time in a cost-effective manner.

We expect our suppliers to adhere to our values of: humanity first, empathy, equality, equity, accountability to affected populations, racial sensitivity, and dignified approaches.

What We Value in Suppliers

We aim to build long-term partnerships with our suppliers who are as passionate about our work as we are.

  • Delivering the right goods and services, at the right price, to the right place at the right time.
  • Having a customer-focused approach to the supply of their goods and services.
  • Demonstrating innovation and excellent service.

What We Buy

Below are some examples of the materials, equipment, goods, and services that we source to allow us to deliver our mission for communities:

Programmatic (Direct)
  • Medical supplies
  • Education materials
  • Fleet and transportation services
  • Construction services
  • Agriculture-related items
Non-programmatic (Indirect)
  • Property leases
  • Travel services
  • Facilities management
  • Human resource services
  • Insurance

Becoming a Supplier

If you are interested in becoming a supplier for GPON, please contact us at procurement@goalprime.org with your company profile and the goods or services you offer.
